content: this project is light and airy with a circular center and delicate picots on each arm just like the other designs it uses almost exclusively basic stitches in fun combinations this snowflake is a part of the 2025 free crochet snowflake patterns collection see all snowflake patterns here on crochetpedia com 1 the pattern is available in the form of **written instructions** and **video tutorials** for right- and left-handed crocheters 1 https //crochetpedia com/crochet-snowflakes-mini-cal/
